mapper.select: select welder.welder_name welderName,welder.welder_no welderNo,dept.name deptName, machine.machine_no weldeNo,dictionary.value_name weldeType,task.task_no taskNo from task_claim claim left join task_info task on claim.task_id = task.id left join welder_info welder on claim.welder_id = welder.id left join machine_weld_info machine on claim.weld_id = machine.id left join sys_dictionary dictionary on machine.type = dictionary.id left join sys_dept dept on welder.dept_id = dept.id where claim.id = #{taskClaim.id}

select task.task_no taskNo,dictionary.value_name statusStr,task.id,task.task_name taskName,task.dept_id deptId, task.craft_remarks craftRemarks from task_info task left join sys_dictionary dictionary on dictionary.id = task.status where task.welder_id = #{welderId} and task.status != 41

select task.task_no taskNo,dictionary.value_name statusStr,task.id,task.task_name taskName,task.dept_id deptId, task.craft_remarks craftRemarks from task_info task left join sys_dictionary dictionary on dictionary.id = task.status where task.status != 41 and task.dept_id = #{deptId} and task.welder_id is null

SELECT dictionary.VALUE firmCode,gather.gather_no gatherNo FROM machine_weld_info machine LEFT JOIN machine_gather_info gather ON machine.g_id = gather.id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary dictionary ON dictionary.id = machine.firm WHERE machine.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT weld_id FROM task_claim WHERE task_id = #{taskId} AND weld_id NOT IN ( SELECT tem1.weld_id FROM( SELECT tem.* FROM ( SELECT weld_id, task_id FROM task_claim GROUP BY weld_id, task_id ORDER BY claim_time DESC ) tem GROUP BY weld_id HAVING tem.task_id != #{taskId}) tem1))
